input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim Untucked Flex Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Paisley Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Wallace & Barnes Cotton Herringbone Workshirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Non Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Non-iron Dress Shirt | D15'
  - Name='Banana Republic Slim-Fit Linen Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Relaxed-Fit Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Flex Casual Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim Flex Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim Flex Casual Shirt'
  - Name='Egara Men's Skinny Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's All-Day Performance Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Cotton Linen Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Geo Print Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim Secret Wash Cotton Poplin Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Long-Sleeve Wrinkle-Free'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Kenneth Cole Men's Regular Fit Non-Iron Checked Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Short-Sleeve Wrinkle-Free'
  - Name='Egara Men's Skinny Fit Spread Collar Medallion Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Kenneth Cole Big & Tall Men's Modern Fit Performance 4-Way Stretch Button Up Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Premium Non-Iron Windowpane Check Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Pronto Uomo Men's Executive Fit Dress Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim Untucked Flex Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit shirt designed to be worn untucked with some stretch fabric indicating casual style, not a traditional dress shirt. Less formal than the reference non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Paisley Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with stretch and dress styling, similar core function and construction to the reference shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Wallace & Barnes Cotton Herringbone Workshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Workshirt typically heavier, more casual and utilitarian than a dress shirt; not primarily for formal or office wear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Non Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit non-iron dress shirt matches all core features of the reference product perfectly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Non-iron Dress Shirt | D15
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt likely standard fit, directly relevant and similar to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Slim-Fit Linen Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Linen fabric and slim fit make it more casual and seasonal, less wrinkle resistant than non-iron cotton dress shirts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Relaxed-Fit Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oxford fabric dress shirt, relaxed fit less formal than trim or standard fit non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Flex Casual Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual oxford fabric shirt with flexible material, less formal than a traditional non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim Flex Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit shirt with some flex/stretch and some dress shirt characteristics but unclear if non-iron or fully dressy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim Flex Casual Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual shirt more than dress shirt despite slim fit and flex fabric, less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Egara Men's Skinny Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-resistant skinny fit dress shirt aligns closely with a non-iron dress shirtâ€™s function and fit style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt made of twill fabric, very similar in function and styling to the reference shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's All-Day Performance Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance shirt intended for comfort and activity rather than strictly dressy occasions, somewhat less formal.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Cotton Linen Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt blending cotton-linen fabric, slightly different fabric but same purpose and styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Geo Print Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron, stretch, and dress shirt style are very similar; pattern does not reduce relevancy significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim Secret Wash Cotton Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Poplin dress shirt with a slim fit but unclear if non-iron, less wrinkle resistant so slightly lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Long-Sleeve Wrinkle-Free
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-free and untucked fit suggests a more casual style than a structured dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly matches reference: slim fit, non-iron dress shirt with similar styling and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kenneth Cole Men's Regular Fit Non-Iron Checked Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Regular fit non-iron dress shirt with pattern, core dress shirt features similar to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-resistant modern fit dress shirt close in function; possibly different wrinkle resistance from non-iron.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Short-Sleeve Wrinkle-Free
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve and untucked fit make it more casual and less a direct alternative to long-sleeve non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Egara Men's Skinny Fit Spread Collar Medallion Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skinny fit dress shirt with spread collar is similar in style and function, pattern does not reduce relevancy much.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kenneth Cole Big & Tall Men's Modern Fit Performance 4-Way Stretch Button Up Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance stretch fabric and big & tall sizing address different needs, less traditional dress shirt style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Premium Non-Iron Windowpane Check Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium non-iron dress shirt, similar function, fabric, and style to the reference product despite pattern.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pronto Uomo Men's Executive Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Executive fit dress shirt aligns closely with the concept of a dress shirt; likely non-iron or wrinkle resistant.
